tool_description: Tracks and manages taxpayer registration application status through various stages of the approval process.

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about status change

assigned_reviewer.description: ID of staff member assigned to review

error_messages: Application not found: No application found with the specified ID
Invalid status transition: Cannot transition from current status to requested status
Invalid priority level: Use one of [low, normal, high, urgent]
Unauthorized reviewer: Assigned reviewer does not have appropriate permissions
Missing required approval: Status update requires additional approvals before proceeding
usage: Provide application ID and current status. Optionally update status, add notes, assign reviewer, or change priority. Tool tracks status changes and maintains history.

next_actions.description: Required next actions to progress application
